fields.name: Q12. Bot DMed me `Oops! Something happened. Canceling the trade: TrainerToolSlow. Trade canceled: TrainerTooSlow`
fields.value: > This is cause by one of two things on your end. You either took too long to offer a Pokémon and the bot timed out and left or you forgot to press A on the Attention window, see pic below, after offering a Pokémon. The trade can not start/continue if you don't press A on that attention pop up.
